question: In which year did the United States come out of the UN Human Rights Council?
explanation:
Former United States President pulled out of the United Nations Human Rights Council in the year 2018, citing its disproportionate focus on Israel.
Recently, the U.S. officials announced that the Joe Biden administration is set to announce that the country will re-join the UNHRC. After formal announcement, the U.S will return as an observer in the U.N body before becoming a full member.
